elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][]My region and the region of the Expedition facing me are {V} and lose their other terrains.  When you roll one or more dice — You may discard a Character from your Reserve. If you do: I gain 1 boost.
[][]My region is {V} in addition to its other terrains.  {R} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: Target Character gains 1 boost.
[][]My region and the region of the Expedition facing me are {V} and lose their other terrains.  {H} You may discard a Character from your Reserve. If you do: [Exhausted Resupply].
[][]My region and the region of the Expedition facing me are {V} and lose their other terrains.  {R} []The next Character you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may exhaust target card in Reserve.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][]My region is {V} in addition to its other terrains.  {H} You may pay {1}. If you do: [Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []Target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less gains [[Anchored]].

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][]My region and the region of the Expedition facing me are {V} and lose their other terrains.  {R} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: [Resupply], otherwise [Exhausted Resupply].
[][]My region is {V} in addition to its other terrains.  {R} Roll a die. On a 4+: You may discard target Permanent.
[][]My region is {V} in addition to its other terrains.  {H} If there are three or more base statistics of 0 among Characters you control: I gain 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may exhaust target card in Reserve.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][]My region is {V} in addition to its other terrains.  {R} If your hand is empty: You may have target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less other than me gain [[Anchored]].

[][]My region and the region of the Expedition facing me are {V} and lose their other terrains.  {J} You may discard a Character from your Reserve. If you do: The next card you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.
[][]My region is {V} in addition to its other terrains.  {H} You may have me gain [[Fleeting]]. If you do: You may return a card from your Reserve to your hand.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Character you play this turn gains 1 boost.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][]My region is {V} in addition to its other terrains.  {H} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: Each player chooses a Character they control. It gains [[Asleep]].
[][]My region and the region of the Expedition facing me are {V} and lose their other terrains.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Character you play this turn gains 1 boost.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][]My region and the region of the Expedition facing me are {V} and lose their other terrains.  {J} If you control a [[Fleeting]] Character: Target Character gains 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []Target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less gains [[Anchored]].

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][]My region is {V} in addition to its other terrains.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next card you play this turn costs {1} less.

elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []Target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less gains [[Anchored]].

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][]My region is {V} in addition to its other terrains.  {R} If there are three or more base statistics of 0 among Characters you control: [Sabotage].

[][]My region and the region of the Expedition facing me are {V} and lose their other terrains.  {H} If your hand is empty: [Resupply], otherwise [Exhausted Resupply]. [][]My region is {V} in addition to its other terrains.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may return a card from your Reserve to your hand.
